name: Verify With Followups
description: [#166961639] APS: Generate and Delivery VOE Correspondence & Verify by Method Forms - For Order Section Label correction

properties.name: Verify With Followups
properties.documentation: Allow for followup contacts for phone, email and fax verifications.

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var reason = task.getExecution().getVariable("utvreasonfa"); reason = (!!reason ? reason : task.getExecution().getVariable("utvreasonem")); task.getExecution().setVariable('additionaldocumentsneeded', (!!reason && reason === 'Needs clarification')); print("additionaldocumentsneeded", task.getExecution().getVariable('additionaldocumentsneeded'));

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var exec = task.getExecution();var taskName = "Clarify " + exec.getVariable("verificationMethod") + " from " + exec.getVariable("employerName") + " Regarding ";taskName += exec.getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName; task.getExecution().setVariable("result", ""); task.getExecution().setVariable("utvreasonem", ""); task.getExecution().setVariable("utvreasonfa", "");task.getExecution().setVariable("currentTaskName",  "clarification");

properties.name: Calculate SLA and Callback

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var exec = task.getExecution(); task.name = "Send Correspondence for " + exec.getVariable("taskName"); if (exec.getVariable("verificationMethod") == exec.getVariable("enumemail")) {     var ct = exec.getVariable("employeremail");     ct += "?subject=CL-SECURE%20Employment%20and%20Income%20Verification - ";     ct += exec.getVariable("applicantName");     ct += "%20" + exec.getVariable("employmentRefId");     ct += "&body=Good%20morning/afternoon%20";     ct += exec.getVariable("employercontactname") + ",%0D%0A%0D%0A";     ct += "Please%20see%20attached%20request%20forms%20";     ct += "regarding%20" + exec.getVariable("applicantName") + ".%0D%0A%0D%0A";     ct += "Thank%20you,";     exec.setVariable("emailcontent", ct); }task.getExecution().setVariable("showfullssn", false);

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var taskName = "Waiting for new SSN " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " for " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName;

properties.name: WaitFor24HoursInVoeFollowupsQueue
properties.documentation: Wait For 24 Hours In VOE Followups Queue

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var taskName = "Waiting for Correspondence from " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " for " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName; task.getExecution().setVariable("result", ""); task.getExecution().setVariable("utvreasonem2", ""); task.getExecution().setVariable("utvreasonfa2", ""); task.getExecution().setVariable('additionaldocumentsneeded',  false);task.getExecution().setVariable("currentTaskName",  "waitingForCorrespondence");task.getExecution().setVariable("showfullssn", false);

properties.name: Calculate SLA and Callback
Unable to Verify or Update Verification Method

fields.name: summary
fields.stringValue: Employer requires non eSigned Consent Form

fields.name: script
fields.stringValue: var taskName = "Waiting for non eSigned consent form " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " for " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName;

fields.name: script
fields.implementation: var taskName = "Waiting for DoB for " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " of " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName;
fields.stringValue: var taskName = "Waiting for DoB for " + task.getExecution().getVariable("employerName") + " of " +  task.getExecution().getVariable("applicantName");task.name = taskName;
